text: aur kuchh gaivaar dehaatee (aise bhee hain ki jo kuchh khuda kee) raah mein kharch karate hain use taavaan (jurmaana) samajhate hain aur tumhaare haq mein (zamaane kee) gardishon ke muntazir (intezaar mein) hain unheen par (zamaane kee) buree gardish pade aur khuda to sab kuchh sunata jaanata hai
